customer_reviews.title: I was a skeptic... now I'm not.
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic. I didn't think beard 'elixer' or beard oil could do much other than make your beard appear different. Boy was I wrong. My beard is softer, thicker, and better looking. I have, historically, had an... unattractive beard. I had some serious beard envy toward all the guys that had well-shaped or thick beards. The difference between a guy with a beard and a beard-guy is grooming and care, including some beard oil or beard balm. I am sure that there are other great products but this has really worked well for me. After three weeks- color me impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Joel O.

customer_reviews.title: Less greasy than generics
customer_reviews.text: This is only my second beard oil I'm trying so my basis of comparison isn't that broad... Pros: -less greasy than what came with my "beard grooming kit" -Spreads and absorbs well -has a pleasant but noticeable scent during the application, but isn't apparent after it absorbs -doesn't leave skin with a layer on it, absorbs completely -pump bottle keeps the area clean and stops the loss of product Cons: -when you first start using this after using a subpar product you get the feeling that it isn't as good because it doesn't spread the same as the cheaper, more oily brands

What is more impressive, however, is the customer service behind this product. There was an issue with the shipping, I brought it to the attention of the company, and they immediately took care of the problem, without me even requesting. Additionally, then checked in with me (via e-mail) to make sure I was satisfied. I highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, however after making my latest purchase I received a phone call from the company, with sexual content and innuendo. As a married man with 3 children, this phone call was uncalled for and disrespectful. The marketing scheme seems to insist that wild Willie products will help you knock off "panties". If you are married this shouldn't be an issue. It's beard oil, and yes women like men. But beard oil, isn't really going to help your chances, with women. Why are men being marketed like teenagers? I will take this review down, if the marketing managers change thier unnecessary tactics. The product sells itself, no need for "sex sells" mindframe. Let's be real men!
